text:
Question ID 177 - Mapping of sustainability matters to topical disclosures (Q&A ID 177)
Question ID 733 – Overlap of ESRS 2 and topical standards
Release date
July 2024
Question asked
Can the ESRS 2 datapoints be overlapping with those in topical standards? What would be the
scope of information the preparer is expected to provide within ESRS 2 (that is distinctive of
topical standards datapoints)?
Compilation of Explanations January—November 2024 Page 80 of 278
